thread.title: Could be excellent if not due to room's location
thread.title_full: Could be excellent if not due to room's location - Review of Apex Temple Court Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: X2993JCcatherinet
title: Could be excellent if not due to room's location
text: This hotel could have been excellent if it is not because of the layout of the floor. The floor is in "U" shape with only 1 elevator at one end. My room happened to be at the other end. After a long day out, it was tiring to walk that long until to get to your room to rest. Everything else was perfect, although the cleaning lady only gave us (2 guests) 1 pair of slippers on the first day and did not realize our kleenex box was low in supply. She did fulfil our requests when asked.
